✱  There is usually a community dustbin built in each locality. The clearing and cleaning is the responsibility

✱  Each family should try to grow a tree or some plants, depending on the space 
available. Children can be taught to look after plants and tend to them.
Keeping the home environment and surroundings clean and healthy is every person’s responsibility. This can be done only by working together as 
one community.
Prevention of accidents and injuries
Accidents at Home 
Many types of accidents can occur at home. Most of them occur in children and 
elderly people. The common accidents are:
✱  Fire and Burns
✱  Poisoning
✱  Suffocation 
✱  Drowning
✱  Falling from a height/stairs
✱  Slipping on a wet, uneven floor
✱  Injuries from sharp
